name: 2021 2nd International Conference on Robotics and Intelligent Control
content: Publicationï¼š Option A: Accepted papers will be published into ICRIC 2021 Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc. Option B: Accepted papers will be published in an issue of International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research (IJMERR, ISSN: 2278-0149, DOI: 10.18178/ijmerr), which will be indexed by Scopus (since 2016), CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
